title: Best Gaming Laptops for $1000 - Which Ones to Buy? Which to Avoid?
description: Dave2D comparison of the best gaming laptops in 2017 that are cheaper.  Comparing build quality, gaming performance, speakers, keyboard, trackpad, battery life.  Dell 7567 -  Acer VX15 -  Lenovo Y520 -  HP Omen -  Asus GL553 -  MSI GE62 -  Sabre 15 -    Individual Reviews: Dell 7567 -  Acer VX15 -  Lenovo Y520 -  Gigabyte Sabre 15 -  HP Omen -  Asus GL553 -   Replacing panels on your laptops can void warranty. Do your research on your particular laptop model/panels. There are lots of good panel options =) GL!
